pullRequest.title: Add support for standard trigraphs
pullRequest.bodyText:
There are two trigraphs in the SQL Standard: ??( for the [ and ??) for the ]. They don't have any special meaning inside character strings or identifiers, they are plain tokens; so they can be easily processed by the Parser without any additional complications (unlike in C++ where they are intentionally not processed by many compilers).
Each database that has basic support for ARRAY data type should also support them; thrigraphs don't have own optional feature.

nodes.bodyText: is it possible this can throw IOOBE ? Looks like i+1 is safe, but not sure about i+2
